name: Rockland VR
description: Head into the 《Rockland VR》 and experience the most fun of puzzles like never before . You can take your time to stack the most beautiful art work or you can complete it as fast as possible.
minimum_requirements: OS: WINDOWS 7/8/10 Processor: CPU i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX970 DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: SteamVR compatible headset required
